title: I drew Gnar again. This time in his Dino outfit.
body:
Thought maybe people would like to see

[](http://i.imgur.com/31C6lkH.jpg)

replies.body: OK, this is too cute. I mean, the adorableness scale just got broke, ok? AUGH <3 <3 <3
Dino Gnar pushes cottontail teemo off of his throne for cutest skin lol
Dino Gnar pushes EVERYONE off the top of the cute list. Koggles will still have a special place in my heart though.
Oh my god the little gurgles Kog makes melt my heart.
Why do the cubes say RIP :O
Cuz you die from cuteness overload.
Now, you need to make a Gnarwhal skin concept...
Riot's not too fond of puns, as proven by their lack of PopstAhri and PandAnnie.

Well, in the latest 2 cases it's plugging the words together. They've already said that Gnar has a silent G, and thus Gnarwhal and narwhal has the exact same pronounciation, making it less of a pun, and more of a less awkward Narwhal Gnar.
Thank you all so much for the nice comments :) It makes me want to draw lots more!
I wonder when gnar is gonna come out?

{{champion:84}}  I HYPNOTIZE U ALL WITH MEH AWESOME GNAR DRAWING ABILITIES!!!
{{champion:17}} NONONONONO NOT AGAIN...sooner or later everyone will leave me to play Gnar!!!!!!!! I'll do anything to stop THAT!
{{champion:18}} hey sweetums seems you could use my help right now...
{{champion:17}} No. I'm done. if it means working with u then I'm not doing anything.



                                                                  -THE TRUTH of Teemo and Tristana's relationship is revealed!!!!!!!!!!!- 
{{champion:78}}  WHY AM I LEFT OUT {{item:3070}} {{item:2044}} {{item:2043}} {{item:3070}} (lol fail at the tears)
Teemo must be jealous of the potential for Gnar plushies.
